start.state: I look forward to my clothes staying on this entire game.

case.state: It feels good to be fully clothed while other women strip. I'll tell you about it sometime.
If Hermione's eighteen, why is she still in her school uniform? I mean, we're all thinking it. Right?
It's pretty weird to watch somebody who looks so young strip.
You're not going to do something stupid, like count your wand as an item? Good.
So, you're undead? Am I understanding that correctly? Because it seems odd that that's okay.
What does a vampire girl look like under her clothes?
If you start trying to eat people, I will end you to death. Alright?
So, Mercy, you raise people from the dead... and everybody's chill with that?
Misty, you're not an overweight middle-aged man from Nebraska. What's with the suspenders?
Serious question: What kind of person wears a belt AND suspenders... with a SKIRT?
We zombie-killers need to stick together. Right, Zoey?
You can survive a zombie plague, but still end up stripping for a bunch of goons. Harsh.
I've seen some pretty great chests in my days...
*Giggle!* I mean...
What's coming off, grrl?
Strip or be stripped!
That's nice!
Nothing wrong with that!
Oh, no... I could be next!
Wait... Samus is a girl?
I'm having uroburos flashbacks!
I need ammo!
She has to show her ass... What a humiliating thing for a woman to do...
Get your ~clothing~ off and shake that ass, girl!
Yes, we get it already, Gogo: You're an asshole. Dial it back a bit.
You sure have a lot of inventory.
Well, let's muscle forward.
Are we really counting that?
Where I come from, it doesn't count as undressing if it doesn't uncover skin.
I've either got the plagas or I'm going gaga!
Stay calm, girl...
We're getting quite the show here!
If I'm the next one to, uh, penetrate my own Code Veronica, I'll just die from embarrassment.
Need an herb over there? The blue one is good for your sex drive, I hear.
I am off to a terrific start, if I say so myself!
It won't happen to me... It won't happen to me...
Ha! We can all see your Code Veronica!
Her vagina's exposed! How embarrassing!
I sure hope I don't have to humiliate myself like that...
That's one opponent I no longer have to worry about.
What's lurking around the corner?
You're counting that? Really?
Drop it and let's move on.
Excuse me, Revy, but do you "strip off" a gun? No, you don't. That's why I won't be counting mine.
We're letting the ghost girl give up a knife in strip poker? I didn't think I'd see the stupidest thing ever today.
Looking good!
Let's unlock your sexier costume!
Oh, shit! You're looking right at me!
I'm not watching, I'm not watching... Hell, I'm probably gonna watch.
I miss Chris.
Keep it together, Sheva. You dealt with that crazy ooze monster, you can deal with this.
Don't worry. I may not be as big as you, but I can still hold my own.
What a pair of rocket launchers!
You Final Fantasy girls sure put a lot of strain on your bras, don't you?
All winning, no losing! Let's keep this streak going.
Time to start Jilling like a Valentine!
Moan like a zombie!
Rose, I'm just gonna say it: I've been praying for your loss since you first opened your stupid mouth.
I am off to a stellar start!
Oh. Um... okay.
Ever consider upgrading your firearm?
What's it gonna be?
Make it something good this time!
That was something else!
This feels like defeating Wesker all over again!
Hee hee! How humiliating!
Ha! Look at those little things!
Murderer with a chainsaw? You'll have to excuse me if I yawn.
If it can happen to her, it can happen to me...
Everybody's boobs are exactly the same size and shape as their bras. Seems a little odd.
Come on, hurry up so we can get to the next hand.
I'm getting annoyed enough that somebody should probably take my gun away.
Wow. You're all really bad at this game.
Alright! Off comes your ~clothing~!
Jiggle on out of that!
It's good to be a winner.
So, what's coming off?
That's something, I guess.
You almost became a ~name~ sandwich!
I thought you were about to turn for a second there, ~name~!
Are you embarrassed?
Pop the top!
Let's see your chocolate cupcakes!
This is weird...
When I woke up today, I didn't expect to be witness to a masterbation.
Need an herb over there? The blue one does wonders for your sex drive, I've heard.
We'll get you naked soon enough!
Kiss your ~clothing~ goodbye, grrl!
Be prepared for a jump scare!
Should we save first, in case we die?
Okay, ready!
Cards on the table!

Let's do this.
I'll take ~cards~ cards.

Hmm...
Ugh...
I need a grenade!
Well, I guess that's gonna happen.
I don't like where this is going...
I guess not all problems can be shot in the head.
Yikes. How am I already behind? I don't even have my boots off yet!

I'm getting annoyed enough that somebody should probably take my gun away.
Alright! Off comes your ~clothing~!
Jiggle on out of that!
It's good to be a winner.
So, what's coming off?
That's something, I guess.
You almost became a ~name~ sandwich!
I thought you were about to turn for a second there, ~name~!
Are you embarrassed?
Pop the top!
Let's see your chocolate cupcakes!
This is weird...
When I woke up today, I didn't expect to be witness to a masterbation.
Need an herb over there? The blue one does wonders for your sex drive, I've heard.
We'll get you naked soon enough!
Kiss your ~clothing~ goodbye, grrl!
Be prepared for a jump scare!
Should we save first, in case we die?
*Ahem* Can... can I have my clothes back now?
Yipe! Not now, ~player~!
Do I really have to stand here like this? Were are my clothes?
You're gonna make us run home naked, aren't you?

text.content: Alright, girls! The name of the game is SKINNY DIPPING!
Wait... what?
Dare I?
C'mon, Ash! It'll be great! The perfect way to cap off a girls' night out!
What if somebody sees us?
YIPE!
No chickening out! We're all doing it! Now get these puppies jiggling before I strip you myself!
Here I go. One... two...
Okay, fine! I'm doing it! Just keep your hands off the merchandise!
Atta gurl! Trust me, this is gonna be great!
My bra is coming off. *Hee-hee!* There's no backing out now!
You too, ~name~! We're all doing this together, so get naked!
Omigod, I can't believe I'm BUTT NAKED! On a PUBLIC BEACH! This is so WILD!
Yeah, this is actually kind of...
Hey, where's Sheva?
Ha ha! Looking good, girls!
Um...
*SMACK!*
*SPANK!*
OW!
YIPE!
~name~, this is revenge for the strip poker game! Claire, this is because your brother never calls! Ashley, this is just because of your whole deal.
LEEEONNN!
Hey, look! These girls are naked!
Good luck, ladies!
This is the guy?
Here's the deal, ~name~: After our strip poker game, you apparently kept my panties as a trophy.
I would like them back.
So I challenge you to a re-match. The four of us, vs you. Deal 'em up!
A few hands later...
You might've mentioned we'd be playing strip poker, Sheva.
I might have, yes.
So I could have worn more than the body suit.
Hee hee!
A few more hands later...
(I can't believe I'm standing here in my panties...)
Wow, you sure are good at this, ~name~!
You managed to reduce three amazing beauties down to nothing but their blushes and their most girlish essential!
Four, if you count me. But since you've already claimed my panties, you probably don't care as much.
URK!
Ah, so this is what a wedgie feels like...
...I don't care for it.
Let me just relieve the ladies of your trophies, shall I?
AIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIII!!! I'm NAKED!
Where's my bra? I need my bra!
There you have it, ~name~! You've completed your "Panties of Resident Evil" collection!
Glad I could be of help.
Now... Can you think of anything else you'd like to do with four beautiful, naked women?
Score! Girl streakers!
Ow! My butt!
Sorry, ladies! I honestly expected that to end differently!
But, best case scenario, you were hoping for a five-way! Right?
